entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SmartBreakLineWithTabTabCompletion2 is flaky #56394
  • Improve diagnostic for conversion of lambda expression to base type with `-langversion:9` and earlier #56391
  • RegisterImplementationSourceOutput should work with partial methods #56390
  • Improve the clarity of CS1660 - "cannot convert [...] to 'T' because it is not a delegate type" #56386
  • Generating overrides from C# to VB include broken <Nullable> attributes #56384
  • Duplicated CS0246 error messgaes #56380
  • Performance: faster switch over string objects #56374
    Compiler.Next
  • Maybe a bug: Inner InvalidProgramException when dealing with `dynamic` and .ToList() #56372
    17.0

Closed

  • CSharpGenerateVariableCodeFixProvider crashed with ArgumentOutOfRangeException #53686
    17.1
  • Compiler emits unnecessary stores for conditional interpolated string handlers #54704
    17.0
  • Stack Overflow in src\Workspaces\Core\Portable\Workspace\Solution\SolutionState.CompilationTracker.cs #56356
  • Missing definite assignment error for complex "is" checks #56298
    17.0
  • Roslyn should have an ETW/EventPipe source that we can use to report data #54770
    17.0
  • Cannot infer delegate type for lambda expression with implicit and explicit `return` statements #55320
    17.0
  • Cannot convert lambda expression to `LambdaExpression` #56033
    17.0
  • Types of fields declared in tuples are bound before the fields are cached in _lazyDeclaredMembersAndInitializers #51204
    17.0
  • Quick using ABI namespace change not backported #55515
    17.1
  • String interpolation produces incorrect output for concatenated strings #55569
    17.0
  • AutomationObject doesn't handle BinaryOperatorSpacingOptions correctly #53104
    17.1
  • First-chance NativeIntegerTypeDecoder+ErrorTypeException in semantic classifier/binder #49823
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't offer to generate parameters in lambdas #56397
    Area-IDE
  • Verify xmldoc for cref to positional property #56396
    Test, New Language Feature - Records
  • Ensure local function invocations and method references always have null receivers #56395
    Area-Compilers
  • Add test to cover pointer to unmanaged T pattern matching #56393
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1362115 #56392
    auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1361888 #56388
    auto-merge
  • Add service for all functions related to FileBanners today in SyntaxFacts #56387
    Area-IDE
  • Add completion tests for parameters in top-level statements #56385
    Area-IDE
  • Update UnitTesting Hot Reload API to consider syntax errors #56379
    Area-IDE
  • Handle interaction of VB with Static Abstract Members in interfaces #56375
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Fix merge if in top level statements #56373
    Area-IDE
  • Fix the condition on passing BuildWithSkipAnalyzers marker file to FUTD #56371
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56364
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56389
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use SpillSequences when appropriate instead of Sequences #56153
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, Next
  • Force tpl antecedent work to run asynchronously to prevent stack overflows #56383
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix equals operator with split state on right #56321
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56382
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56381
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Infer delegate type from lambda expression with explicit return statements without expressions #56236
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Update P4 packages #56366
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Control exposure of tuple fields #56293
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Support implicit conversions of lambda expressions to LambdaExpression #56200
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Factor process telemetry service out of RemoteHostService #56329
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add missing using directive #56378
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Introduce Parameter Priority #56359
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56368
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56363
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56361
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't restrict allowed values #56365
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56362
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove ErrorTypeException from native int decoder #56350
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Read StorageOptions from solution snapshot. #56307
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56399
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56398
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Delete remaining bits of IWaitIndicator #56355
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor code to simpler implementation using `_pool.ToListAndFree(..)` #56277
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Inline diagnostics and intellicode cohesion #55095
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Errors
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
  • Follow syntaxfacts pattern #56351
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crashes in some nullable error scenarios #56190
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Fix DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader #56357
    Area-Analyzers
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • List patterns: Correctly report the missing member #56287
    Area-Compilers
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE
